website_summaries.verdict: An Energy Star-compliant refrigerator with 3.1 cubic feet of space that features a separate freezer.
pros: This model includes a freezer section
The unit features a vegetable crisper and cover, an in-door can rack, and a cycle defrost so the unit won't freeze over on you
cons: Remember, you will lose a good bit of space to the freezer, so the refrigerator may be smaller than you are imagining

customer_reviews.title: Good Fridge
customer_reviews.text: Wife got a new job and wanted a larger fridge with dedicated freezer as well as a crisper for her lunch salads. Good product, very light. I though I would need a dolly to get it into her office but once we got it unpackaged I carried it (6'01, 210 lbs. man mind you.) Cooled off very quickly (unlike an RV fridge) and is ultra quiet. A little pricey or 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Freezer/Refrigerator will meet your needs
customer_reviews.text: We bought this small refrigerator because of the freezer. We wanted it big enough to hold a half gallon of ice cream and other things. The freezer has plenty of room. It holds temperature well. The refrigerator has decent storage. We wanted white to match another small one that had no freezer.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Nice little frig with a real freezer
customer_reviews.text: A compact frig with a real freezer - have only had it a week, though it seems to be working fine. It is a bit noisy while it's working to cool the frig / freezer down, though completely quiet once it reaches your desired temperature. It's just what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Monster

customer_reviews.title: I like this product very much.
customer_reviews.text: After receiving it, I was very happy. I have used it for a while and I am very happy that I can have it now. The product looks good, and both refrigeration and freezing work well. I am obsessed with it. It is placed in my small living room, next to my TV cabinet, and my children have already put a lot of decorative stickers on it. I just feel that it is just a little waste of electricity, but I think it may be my own reason, but I can bear such a guy because it brings me enough convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Li Zhao Gaudet

customer_reviews.title: Danby shouldn't be greedy with the price but 4stars is reasonable
customer_reviews.text: Price a little ridiculous for the amount of storage space but its nice cuz it works the way it suppose to
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was hoping for....a nice small dorm fridge! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly O'Keefe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: Great, perfectly functional. I was worried it would have a dent in it cuz of the other reviews but it came in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Got it in January - Loved it! Worked great until June. Now after 5 short months does not work. Sent an email to their Customer Service Dept & I still have not heard back from them. Terrible Customer Service!
customer_reviews.author: Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: It arrived dented. A refund of some sort is required.
customer_reviews.author: jeanine judge

customer_reviews.title: Don't trust Danby
customer_reviews.text: If I could I would give it zero stars. Didn't even have the appliance 1 day and the compressor went. Danby's customer service is disgusting. The Danby customer service agent said to me "the compressor can't be fixed, but I wouldn't expect you to know that." So he was insinuating women don't have any knowledge about appliances? . They make you jump through hoops to get your money back (although you won't get tax back just what you paid for product since it is a Canadian Company) I have done and sent them all the necessary items, receipts, and pictures they requested and I still have not gotten an update as to when they will send me a check.

customer_reviews.title: Noise
customer_reviews.text: Love it except for this noise It is always running like this
customer_reviews.author: stenogrl

customer_reviews.title: The fridge is perfect. Not one dent in it when it cam
customer_reviews.text: The fridge is perfect. Not one dent in it when it cam. Though it was delivered upside down, I ler it rest for 24 hours then plugged it in. It works well and keeps the food well. It is great in the dorm room, and not super noisy. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We are having a lot of issues The Lower part ...
customer_reviews.text: We are having a lot of issues The Lower part gets all ice, even we lowered the freezer Thinking on returning it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not satisfied. This fridge was displayed as a double door but it was a single door fridge
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Best minifridge and freezer
customer_reviews.text: Best of both worlds, it's about 4 feet tall and has a great look to it. The freezer can fit a 12 pack of drinks (mine if full of ice cream) and the fridge can hold a week's worth of food for one person (if the person likes to cook, I have veggies and fruits in there as well as a liter soda). As with any fridge, do not tip. Fridges, including minifridges, contain freon that allow it to keep food cool, the freon leaks when tipped (I did not put mine to the side but learned this information from someone who was helped me get the minifridge out of the box).
customer_reviews.author: CoolGorilla

customer_reviews.title: Did they throw it around the warehouse?
customer_reviews.text: Arrived significantly damaged. Using it in a rec room bar so it just has to be cold. But would have preferred it not have multiple large dents on arrival. If it wasn't such a likely PITA I'd send it back.
customer_reviews.author: YourCaptainSpeaking

customer_reviews.title: Door does not shut properly
customer_reviews.text: The lower door, when opened, drops down on the post about 3/8ths of an inch and then when you close it, you have to lift up from the bottom of the door (meaning you get on one knee and lift). My educated guess is there is a missing washer/spacer on the bottom past of the door/post.
customer_reviews.author: D Turner

customer_reviews.title: Nice fridge with freezer
customer_reviews.text: This unit is really nice. It came well packaged and it was received undamaged. I let it sit upright for 24 hours (as per instructions) then I plugged it in. It runs quiet and I really like the freezer because it is roomy. The fridge part is nice too. The refrigerator got things really cold on 7 so I went down to 6 to see how that goes. I recommend this item. I will update if anything goes wrong (I have only had it 2 days) but so far I am REALLY glad I chose this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Pdachsie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my upstairs kitchen to replace an older one that made my food & drinks freeze. This one refrigerated my food & drinks even and the freezer work well too. If anyone's wondering if the fridge has a light, it has 1 incandescent 10watt light included. The "stainless steel" color is more like a grey color so don't expect to be a real stainless steel but its decent. Enough room to store my food & drinks in for 1 person. The compressor is a little noisy but isn't too bad. Good quality & price range.
customer_reviews.author: 2MARKO

customer_reviews.title: Refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son. After setting it up, the door was out of alignment. We had to use washers to get it to seal. Since then, it has worked beautifully. I wish the manufacturer would have at least added washers to the delivery or be sure the door can seal. .
customer_reviews.author: J. Schell

customer_reviews.title: Dead in Less than 30 Days
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my garage, it arrived, and worked for a few weeks. Went out one afternoon and everything was warm inside, but you could still hear it running. I called Danby Support, they took down my name, email address, said they would send me a followup email with instructions on where to take it. After 5 days, no email, so I returned it for a replacement through Amazon. We will see if the next one lasts or not.
customer_reviews.author: UsualSuspect

customer_reviews.title: Excellent freezer for small fridge
customer_reviews.text: I chose this product because of the separate freezer compartment and I am happy with my choice. It has a lot of room in the freezer area and it works well. It is also completely silent. I have used it for a couple months and haven't heard a peep out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Mason

customer_reviews.title: Has some frost issues in the back of the fridge but does it’s job
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, the refrigerator portion has issues with ice crystals along the back wall which alternately melts and freezes and goes into the drain in the back, regardless of which temperature I chose. I use this mini fridge for life sustaining medications so that is a bit concerning. I tend to keep all of my items towards the front so the times it freezes it does not affect the medication.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Plug directly into wall
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a dorm room. It works perfectly for her needs. Package arrive undamaged and no damage to the product. One thing the instruction book does NOT tell you is that it will NOT work plugged into a surge protector, it has to be plugged directly into the wall. I would highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a good fridge for their college student.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie J.

customer_reviews.title: It’s nicer than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I went through the hassle of ordering this wonderful compact fridge. It works perfectly. The effort to finally get the one I had ordered required one-on-one assistance from customer service, and although I suffered some serious frustration, the end result was an amazing rep named Amari who saved the day. Thank you, Amari. Great effort to satisfy your customer. So, thankfully I had read about the importance of letting the unit rest after delivery. I didn’t want to take any chances so I gave it a full 24-hours before plugging it in. And it works GRRRRReat! I love this little fridge, and there’s more room in it than I had imagined. Perfect for my needs. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: Not once, but twice!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter for her college dorm, but liked it so much I bought another one. Now, I have one in my bedroom. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Young

customer_reviews.title: Loud vibrating inside compressor
customer_reviews.text: We received the unit and it made a loud vibrating noise. We let it sit for a day before plugging it in. We checked the screws/bolts to make sure everything was tight and let it sit for another day. Still loud/vibrating noise. Then we let it sit for a week. Still same loud/vibrating noise. I will say, Amazon customer service contacted Danby for me. I was able to prove the loud noise over the phone to the Danby customer service rep. I was issued a refund through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: A. Waltz

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Dent in the top door, and scratches on the side. Contacted the seller, and they could refund us $20 max. We could get a full refund, but it meant boxing the whole thing up (the box was destroyed during the opening process). They'd send a pre-paid label, and they'd arrange for a courier to pick it up -- so that's good. We just decided it wasn't worth the hassle or the gamble on whether or not the next one would be damaged even worse. We'll take a sharpie to the scratches, and hope the dent isn't too noticeable. Can't comment on how the fridge works yet, since we just got it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and spacious
customer_reviews.text: Just got this refrigerator a week ago. It was well packaged and had no dents. I cannot believe the quality of this item. It truly is a miniature version of a regular size refrigerator. I wanted the two doors so that I had more freezer capacity and I got what I wanted. So far the refrigerator has been very quiet not to mention attractive. The light inside the refrigerator sure makes it easy to see items
customer_reviews.author: David Boehm

customer_reviews.title: Quit working and I can't return it.
customer_reviews.text: Totally stopped working after 5 weeks. According to my Amazon account, I could have returned it last week. I wish it had broken then. That, or continued to function. $200 is a lot to pay for an appliance that craps out so quickly. Buy elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised - look elsewhwere
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived damaged, see pictures, with no visible damage to either the shipping box or inner box. Additionally, the description says "cycle defrost" which I expected to mean the freezer would be "self defrosting" but not so. The instructions indicate it is "manual" defrost which isn't really what you want for a college dorm. Very disappointed in the condition and the unit description. Recommend looking elsewhere as you can find non-frost free units much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Jkat0213

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Product
customer_reviews.text: When the package arrived it had an enormous amount of tape all around the package, after removal of the product the door was opened and it would not shut again the door is about 1/4 off so it does not shut properly and there is a small dent on the side of the door. Other wise it seemed to be a very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Danby has the best ratings, product arrived in good condition. Look no further choose this company.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my bedroom and it really coordinates good with my bedroom/office furnishings. The color choice of black with stainless steel easily works good with my Ashley dark cherry wood desk and chair. Second having the separate freezer above easily stores multiple frozen food items. I like that, and I think in the long run that will cut down on defrosting time. Yes, these are manual defrosting, but it's not a big chore like their kitchen cousins. Lastly, buy with confidence, quality, and no buyers remorse. I did! I did a short survey with Danby when I registered it online and got my warranty extended for free.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Oil and water leaking frequent, Danby tech support never response
customer_reviews.text: This refrigerator frequently leak and the top frozen generating a lot of ice block the storage. It is still new. I am looking for replacement or repairing right now. A lot of thick ice buildup at the refrigerator, and freezer, the temperature control is bad. the storage become very small in both area. No matter how to adjust temperature, cannot stop water leaking. Contact Danby technical support to the company, no response for 2 months
customer_reviews.author: Janice Wong

customer_reviews.title: Keeping Things Kool
customer_reviews.text: Keeps a steady temperature that many refrigerators this size do not. Food lasts a long time and freezer does not frost up...both pluses!
customer_reviews.author: Mount Up!

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fridge in Dec 2018 and have had it for almost a year and a half. It arrived in once piece with no damage, which seems to be an issue with this product and amazon. I love it and have had no issues with it so far. It runs nice and cold. Has plenty of space for what I use it for and runs very quiet. I don't even hear it half the time. That black stainless steel is very sleek and I plan to use this for years to come hopefully.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Danby products good, Amazon delivery not so much.
customer_reviews.text: 15 people handled my mini fridge before arriving with a barely noticeable tiny dent next to an obvious 2x2 dent close to the center of one side that looks like someone threw a golf ball at it. Other than that, it works well (so far)
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a day before they said it would! My previous 15 year old mini fridge died and I needed one right away. The local store price was identical. I keep it in my bedroom for my essential oils and it doesn't disrupt my sleep. Its relatively quiet and doesn't run often. I keep the temperature control between 4 -5 with the coldest setting being 7. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: McDonnells

customer_reviews.title: Temperature control issues
customer_reviews.text: It is too cold, essentially freezing anything I put in it. Nice looking, sizable storage...but temperature control limits its usefulness.
customer_reviews.author: Norma B.

customer_reviews.title: Quilty and style
customer_reviews.text: It came its the size great quilty one thing it puts out so well and I'm in Alabama turn it up to 7 and y'all will have a double freezer it works well.
customer_reviews.author: razor

customer_reviews.title: Dented, needs replacement
customer_reviews.text: I have to wait until Monday to call for a replacement. One side of the refrigerator is wavy with dents throughout and the back corner is dented in. I’m glad I ordered this a few weeks early from when I’ll need it so there’s time to replace. I just hope the next shipment isn’t dented too. Other than that it looks nice but we decided to not plug it in and see if it works since we’re returning.
customer_reviews.author: KamB

customer_reviews.title: The perfect mini fridge!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mini fridge in 2016 when I was living in a small bachelor apartment for 3 years. It worked great, never had any issues with it. It's got enough space to hold plenty of items. Now 4 years later living in a home the fridge is still running perfectly. I have it in my spare office to keep drinks & spirits cool. I definitely recommend this buy for anyone looking for a small fridge.
customer_reviews.author: JulienCassidy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality highly recommend! 😊
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad I was tired of seeing him have to self defrost the last one plus it had stopped working this one is great it holds extra stuff that can’t go in big refrigerator I have had no issues with this one packaging was on point no scrapes or dents!
customer_reviews.author: Carrico

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Works better than my full size. Great for small room and any office within your private space. It's also saves on energy. the proof is within my energy bill. I paid more than I wanted to, but the total outcome is what you have to keep in mind. Not easy in this economy, but I have learned is that, you truly get what you pay for. Look for quality and what helps you the most!
customer_reviews.author: Sara T

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking little fridge for the price!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in timely f awhile, but the box was kind of broken on the bottom. There was a dent on the top left corner, but it doesn t seem to affect it. Other than that, it seems to be a pretty nice little fridge for the price. The bonus is a separate freezer which is very good size!
customer_reviews.author: candi

customer_reviews.title: Much too small. Pictures are very deceiving.
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with the lack of interior capacity in the refrigerator area. I was going from a small refrigerator to a larger one and I have less space in my larger one than I did in my smaller one. It’s unbelievable. The freezer is an improvement over what I had but the refrigerator which is what I needed is a huge disappointment. I have to keep my old small refrigerator in addition to the new one in order to have enough space in the small apartment where I am now living.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marku

customer_reviews.title: Kind of okay product
customer_reviews.text: It isn't very reliable with temperature but does keep things cold. I received this product damaged as well. Made of cheap metal but if you just keep small drinks and such this is and okay product. I've had it for almost a year and it hasn't broken yet either!
customer_reviews.author: air

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our G'son college dorm room. Very nice and freezes ice cream! Well worth paying a little extra and temp control for refrigerator works great also.
customer_reviews.author: Angeldove

customer_reviews.title: Man Cave Fridge
customer_reviews.text: Shipping not so great and did have a ding but not visible and unit is great,,, Smaller than some others I looked at but great for a man cave and you can have ice cream.....
customer_reviews.author: Raini Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Features,dont buy,pricey,small
customer_reviews.text: Pros, 2 door, fridge/freeze That's the reason I give it 2 stars, is for that feature. Cons, Pricey for small storage All I have is a 64 oz. Bottle of gatorade and a party side tray from panda Express, and their ain't much room left,see pics.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t get to use.
customer_reviews.text: Showed up with several things broken. Box was fine which made me think it was packed like that. 2 of the broken parts were inside and couldn’t have happened in shipping. Have no idea if it worked. Returned the next day and was promptly refunded.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Ray

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: It okay for the price. the freezer is SUPER small and you can "maybe" fit a tray of ice cubes and a pint of ice cream. But, it is reasonably priced and we just wanted some extra frigeration and for that, it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: JonesFromHull

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my son's dorm-room. He loves it but ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son's dorm-room. He loves it but it is a little loud for my taste, it doesn't seem to bother him,
customer_reviews.author: MKH

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Freezer space bigger then expected. Saw a review that it’s loud but I can barley hear it and it’s in my bedroom. Love the design and color. Keeps my food frozen in the freezer and the temperature in the fridge is really good. Came in with no damages and it was easy to install. Just a plug and play.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Great! Just be careful of temp setting
customer_reviews.text: Great for the Office! Have to watch the temp settings though ir I’ll freeze items in the fridge—. Finally found the sweet spot but took a few weeks of trial. Still, Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Calm_dn

customer_reviews.title: Ice maker has a mind of it’s own.
customer_reviews.text: The refrigerator works great with the exception of two things and both have to do with the ice maker. It takes up too much room in your tall item section of the frig. The other is that the ice machine either spills out a blast of ice all at once that often you end up picking up off your floor or can jam up sometimes leaving ice hanging inside the non cooled spout that releases as it melts long after you’ve walk away and again spreading ice onto your floor.
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: Like the size of the freezer
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for over a month. Works great and yes it as the sound you would expect from a small refrigerator. The freezer works great as the bottom refrig does. Like the size of the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: FUAH

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the drain in tje back of the fridge! Its such a good size and stays cold. I.like it better than the single door ones
customer_reviews.author: Kandee Li

customer_reviews.title: Great smaller fridge
customer_reviews.text: I love this smaller fridge. It replaces the old one I had. It’s great for one person and doesn’t take up a lot of space. Easy to move also.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Worster

customer_reviews.title: Very Loud Fridge
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand how a fridge can be so noisy. These types of fridge are supposed to be built for small space living and all the noise coming from the fridge is very distracting, even at the lowest setting.
customer_reviews.author: Weyso

customer_reviews.title: Has all you need in a Fridge/Freezer but half the size
customer_reviews.text: Everything I was hoping to get and a little smaller then I thought it was going to be. I was unsure my decision to go with this over the drink cooler with double thick glass an TC control was going to be upsetting but 1st day showed why the freezer was indeed a good deciding factor to have when making the decision. If your looking for a fridge n freezer but more compact I would more then suggest considering this set up.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Marcelino

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: We like the refrigerator alot it's exactly what we wanted but it came to us damaged. It is only cosmetic damage but it was damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us
customer_reviews.text: I particularly like that it has a separate freezer door. Hopefully this will make us not have to defrost so much as our last one, which lasted only 32 years.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Mayo DDS

customer_reviews.title: Nice fridge
customer_reviews.text: Ours arrived a little scuffed from shipping, but everything works on it, and it's big enough to hold everyone's stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Kailhofer

customer_reviews.title: Great company to deal with
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit. We did have a problem but the seller GoBLT solved it very fast. A big thank you to rep ‘Barbara’
customer_reviews.author: Shrimptank

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Received today with pretty significant damage. It appears to be working though.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Rast

customer_reviews.title: Freezer stays nice and cold!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice size refrigerator and the freezer stay very nice and cold, freezing everything nicely...So Glad I chose this frig...5 Stars here!!
customer_reviews.author: DJ's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Working fine so far
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive. Working fine so far. I am a bit confused by the fact that the bottom, rear compartment of the refrigerator, where the motor, is located, is completely open. It just seems like there should be some kind of removable cover...
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great refrigerator.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed in a small room. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: WCK

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Its quiet and works. I am happy I bought the largest model because if you are used to a full size model I cannot see go any smaller
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: There is quite a bit of storage and it is the perfect size for my office
customer_reviews.text: The fridge itself is decent. There is quite a bit of storage and it is the perfect size for my office. The issue (and I should have known from the reviews) is that it came very damaged. The packaging of this product is minimal and it’s understandable how this fridge can be easily damaged in retail storage or in freight. It definitely has a hum to it and is not quiet. I would order cautiously or be prepared to send it back for a replacement and there is no guarantee that it will arrive in brand new condition.
customer_reviews.author: lkweb

customer_reviews.title: Not so happy
customer_reviews.text: The product came damaged with a dent on the side and it’s very noisy, if I wouldn’t have thrown the packaging away I would have sent it back. I can say it do get your stuff nice and cold I had my temperature on 5, I notice that the inside of the refrigerator was sweating so I turned it down to 4
customer_reviews.author: Sonya DeVore

customer_reviews.title: No more
customer_reviews.text: Solid fridge for my room to keep my roommates from eating my food.
customer_reviews.author: Future ghost

customer_reviews.title: Compact fridge with frost free freezer!
customer_reviews.text: Love this 3.1 cu. ft. refrigerator. Best features for me are 1) frost free freezer, and 2) light. Have no regrets. You won't either!
customer_reviews.author: Eb

customer_reviews.title: Stable temp, strong and solid
customer_reviews.text: Excellent refrigerator! I have this in my office and it’s been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Cash

customer_reviews.title: Had a dent, but is a nice fridge
customer_reviews.text: It’s great looks nice but has a dent in the back feel like I need some money for me having to keep this dented fridge. At least some type of discount. Cause I’m not gonna send it back and get charged an arm and a leg.
customer_reviews.author: Austin E

customer_reviews.title: Small , but love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far, can't complaint. If there an update. I'll update later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great dorm room refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Bought this refrigerator for my sons dorm room and he loves it !
customer_reviews.author: Paul E. Schlegel

customer_reviews.title: Great little fridge
customer_reviews.text: Just as described and so far working great. There is slight higher pitched hum when it is running but nothing that keeps us up at night it being right next to our bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kali Breeze

customer_reviews.title: Came with a dent in the door.
customer_reviews.text: Unboxed the mini fridge and has a nice little dent in the door. Thought I was buying a brand new one not from the dent and scratch sale. Other than that, good fridge.
customer_reviews.author: T Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great basement fridge
customer_reviews.text: Great basement fridge! Freezer top door is nice for ice trays & other frozen items. Lots of space in fridge part too! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sdoise

customer_reviews.title: Double check for dents
customer_reviews.text: We are enjoying this fridge. It’s a perfect size for a studio apt. It arrived however dented in two places. Packaging was very beat up as if fridge was tossed around. We are not returning it but some compensation would be nice for the two dents it came with.
customer_reviews.author: carol a kett

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this so ,much i am buying a second one for my spare room
customer_reviews.author: Lisa somers

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived with broken glass and plastic draw. This could have been avoided if box said keep upright or top. Even a simple sticker that said fragile.
customer_reviews.author: paul tillson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is for my granddaughters college dorm room. Just got it so I'm hoping it works well for her
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L. Reali

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Item never got cold first one arrived dented. Had to send it back twice! Not worth the problem!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great dorm fridge
customer_reviews.text: So quiet, it's right next to my bed. I like the fact that the freezer is on the top and separate.
customer_reviews.author: BlueCove

customer_reviews.title: FIT AND FINISH MUCH BETTER THAN EXPECTED
customer_reviews.text: JUST PLUGED IN TO VERIFY OPERATION. COLD QUICK, QUIET OPERATION, INSIDE LIGHT A BONUS. FIT AND FINISH MUCH BETTER THAN EXPECTED. SEPARATE FREEZER SHOWS GOOD ENGINEERING . HAVE NOT YET INSTALLED TO ITS WORKING LOCATION
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product dented
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the product's performance, but disappointed that one of the corners on the fridge was dented, and no evidence that the box had substained any damage. So that lends me to believe the product was already dented when packaged for shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Rupe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for College Dorm Room
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter's college dorm room. Perfect. Just like the product was described. Working like a champ. Great Product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cold & Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time VERY Quite, Cold in short time, 7 cold settings. Very Nice face, Plan is for camping Happy with the purchase. Amazon has made this cargo van conversion Very Easy..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good small fridge
customer_reviews.text: Great little fridge. Love the separate freezer. A little less refrigerator space than I need for my taller items, but it is what was shown. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a couple months now and so far so good! It’s the exact size we were looking for, a little bigger than the small compact fridges. It’s a beautiful color and works amazing so far! Love it
customer_reviews.author: marisa

customer_reviews.title: The product and Accuary of Shipment.
customer_reviews.text: Love my New Refrigerator.. Thanks for quick delivery b4 date of Arrival..works Great!!..be Bless.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Vinson

customer_reviews.title: Great for guest house!
customer_reviews.text: Great mini fridge/freezer. Bought two for guest houses and have been really impressed with how well they run and great they look. For a mini fridge, the noise level is totally acceptable. I was expecting it to be louder. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Heglie

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Did not come dented like other reviews said, I plugged it in and within 30 minutes it was nice and cold. Filled it up with drinks and snacks and the next morning ice cream was nice and frozen, drinks were nice and cold! Great purchase for now, will update if something happens.
customer_reviews.author: john kim

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: I love this refrigerator! I am using it from about 3 months and its working great! Even though it does not say self defrost, I never had to manually defrost it up to now. I also like its metallic finish. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: A few people have had problems with this, but I made sure to follow the directions and waited 4 hours before turning it on and it works fine for me
customer_reviews.author: Logan S.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy fridge for a dorm room
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy fridge for a dorm room. The stainless looks great. So far, my college kid has no complaints. Good value--quiet, works well, roomy inside but not too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Osa

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift. Was needed for a college ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. Was needed for a college dorm and haven't had any problems with it at all. Shipment was faster than expected and package was not damaged upon arrival. Would buy again as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Picard

product_meta.title: Danby DCR031B1WDD Mini Fridge, White
product_meta.description: Having separate fridge and freezer refrigerators is definitely a great thing! You get that convenient combination and much more with this splendid dual-door compact refrigerator by Danby. This model offers 3.1 cu. ft. (87 L) of cooling and freezing capacity and is Energy-Star compliant to help keep electricity costs as low as possible. The popular appliance is a perfect match for apartments, rec-rooms, bars, cottages and offices. It has a high-tech mechanical thermostat to make sure your foods are always stored at the correct temperature and has a handy manual defrosting system. It comes with an intelligent reversible-door feature which allows you to adjust it for either left or right-handed opening. This glamorous fridge/freezer is a breeze to keep clean due to the stunning white finish. Inside the appliance you’ll find a bright interior light as well as a see-through vegetable crisper with glass cover and plenty of space for tall bottles. The integrated door handle adds another touch of class.
feature_bullets: Dimensions: 18 7/8" W x 19.68" D x 33 7/16" H
1 full width tempered glass shelf for maximum storage versatility
